Activity: Follow up with @ehrdev-1, @ehrdev-2, @da-1, and @da-2 on the data quality remediation progress.
Review updated data quality reports from @qatest-1 and @qatest-2. Assess the effectiveness of the remediation efforts.
Conduct a meeting with @clinlead-1, @rn-1, @rn-2 and @rn-3 to review the data and discuss the initial influenza trends.
Document the meeting minutes and action items.
Address any remaining data quality issues. Escalate issues to senior management if necessary.
Review the project budget and expenses. Identify any potential cost overruns. Check the remaining budget with @mrs-1 and @mrs-2 to see if the budget is enough for the project.
Communicate any budget concerns to senior management. Develop a plan to mitigate cost overruns.
Update the project status report. Highlight key accomplishments, challenges, and risks.
Prepare a summary of the day's activities and plan for tomorrow.
